column1: Uchi////In my top 3 restaurants in Houston.  Uchi will change the way you look at Sushi and will probably ruin most other places for you
column2: so beware.  Something about the rice is just so unique and amazing.  No need to drown in soy sauce or slathers of wasabi.  Went with my girlfriend a few months ago for the Prix Fixe.  The staff was super cool
column4: and made what could have been a very pretentious
column5: stuffy experience into something that was fun and low key.  The ambiance reminds me of a lot of my favorite restaurants in New York
column6: in that it is a fine dining experience that is fun
column8: and innovative.  A little on the pricey side
column9: but worth every penny.  Leave your sports coat at home.
